text: <@U02E3CRMA> lets talk b4 you respond to henry pls

For those following along at home: found a hardware bug in the serial adapter board we’re using for Arduino. After some hardware debug time together, Peter and I were able to unblock and get him rolling again.
Major takeaway is that ADX got way in over their head when it came to integration of all the pieces, and that it’s requiring some serious reverse-engineering and Arduino jiggery to solve.
I saw encouraging signs before I left from Peter’s work today, so let’s take stock tomorrow morning.
We definitely have the right guy on dev for this - just a matter of how much we can reasonably sink into it.
